page.title: 10recreation
page.content: { There is a village hall to which people go for meetings & entertainment.The Youth club,the Toddlers group,the Parish Council & the Women's Institute meet there regularly.There is a playing field & some allotments near the hall.Close to Barrington Court there is a cricket pitch with a thatched pavilion.The football pitch is at the top of the hill between Barrington & Stocklinch. Puckington & Stocklinch both have a small village hall.Their Post Offices have been closed.They are served by mobile shops & a library van. Barrington has a Public House which serves meals.Mobile vans supply perishible foods.A library van visits once a month.A farm shop sells vegetables.
